experiences.title: Backend Engineer
experiences.subtitle: interface.ai
workDescription: Built an ETL pipeline to map user intents and identify supported/unsupported intents for product feedback at scale. Leveraged GPT chat completion API for context-based labeling and automated ingestion, labeling, and exporting, optimizing data handling with a replicated database.
Developed and composed an ASR component using Python and Azure STT models, leveraging LLMs to improve call efficiency by 40%. Devised a training pipeline to enhance model accuracy.
Led feature development and enhancement of the core engine handling financial AI queries with async Node.js. Ensured continual robustness and refinement for new functionalities.
Implemented voice biometric authentication for users, improving security and ensuring smooth integration with different banking cores.

experiences.title: Full Stack developer
experiences.subtitle: Tekmonks Inc
workDescription: Drove an in-house agents system to track metrics like CPU, OS, RAM, memory, and system health. Added real time monitoring for frontend engines too.
Initiated and refined an in-house framework for building web components; streamlined development processes, resulting in 30% reduction in time-to-market for new features.
Designed a real time monitoring dashboard using react, utilizing access logs to mitigate prominent cyber threats, such as DDoS attacks and SQL injections, on a high-traffic platform.

experiences.title: App Developer
experiences.subtitle: miniOrange
workDescription: Embedded OTP verification at critical touchpoints, boosting security and user experience.
